title: Geopolitical analysts
extract: Geopolitics (from Greek γῆ gê "earth, land" and πολιτική politikḗ "politics") is the study of the effects of geography (human and physical) on politics and international relations. ... Geopolitics focuses on political power linked to geographic space.
extract_html: Geopolitics (from Greek γῆ gê "earth, land" and πολιτική politikḗ "politics") is the study of the effects of geography (human and physical) on politics and international relations. ... Geopolitics focuses on political power linked to geographic space.
